column4: how do you make appear items from /usr/lib/menu in the gnome menu ?
so everybody install software and launch it using the command line or is there a way to make appear items from /usr/lib/menu in the gnome menu ?.. lol
usually the installer puts it there.  otherwise you have to use a tool like smeg to edit the menu
maybe i can add items manually with smeg but since there's a lot of menu items in /usr/lib/menu anybody would LOVE use something like update-menus instead...
